snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton, a former Arkansas first lady, made a rare foray back into the state’s politics, urging the governor there to veto a religious freedom bill similar to the law passed in Indiana.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, a former Arkansas first lady, made a rare foray back into the state’s politics, urging the governor there to veto a religious freedom bill similar to the law passed in Indiana.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Urges Veto of Arkansas ‘Religious Freedom’ Bill
